scripts.create:silent: dotenv -- cross-var graph create $SUBGRAPH_NAME --node http://$GRAPH_NODE_API || true
scripts.setup: dotenv -- cross-var wait-on http-get://$GRAPH_NODE_GRAPHQL && npm run create:silent
scripts.redeploy: dotenv -- graph codegen && dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --ipfs $IPFS_URL --node http://$GRAPH_NODE_API $SUBGRAPH_NAME
scripts.wait:deploy: dotenv -- cross-var wait-on $IPFS_URL/api/v0/version http-get://$GRAPH_NODE_GRAPHQL && run-s redeploy
scripts.hosted:redeploy: echo "deploying $SUBGRAPH_NAME ..." && dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $SUBGRAPH_NAME
